001package edu.pdx.cs410J.lang;
002
003/**
004 * This class simply prints "Hello World".
005 *
006 * @author David Whitlock
007 */
008public class Hello {
009  
010  /**
011   * This method is where the JVM starts executing.
012   *
013   * @param args
014   *        Command line arguments from console
015   */
016  public static void main(String[] args) {
017    System.out.println("Hello World");
018  }
019}
